title: "Hijab row: Face recognition cameras installed, checkpoints opened at the Vellore fort"
excerpt: "Face recognition cameras, metal detectors, checkpoints and barricades have been installed at the 16th Century fort in Vellore, following the arrest of seven persons, including a juvenile, for allegedly forcing a woman to remove her hijab at the fort."
